prompts.prompt: Create a clear and compact personal security report for my recent activity (last 30 days). Keep it easy to read and avoid technical jargon. Include: (1) Profile: my name and UPN. (2) Last sign-in: date/time (UTC), app, result, location, and IP. (3) Sign-in summary: counts by result (success/failure/blocked) and top apps. (4) Risk detections: counts by level and the 3 most recent events (time, type, IP, location). (5) Devices: total devices, how many are not compliant, oldest sync date, and up to 3 main issues. (6) Authentication: show if MFA and self-service password reset are set up, plus a short list of my sign-in methods. (7) App consents: number of apps I approved and the main ones with their access. (8) Locations: top countries/cities for my sign-ins. End with a short 'Key callouts' (max 3 bullets) showing only unusual findings — no extra details or advice.

template.name: my-security-report
template.title: My security (report)
template.description: Generates a compact, easy-to-read report of sign-ins, risks, devices, authentication, app consents, and locations from the last 30 days, ending with only key anomalies.

prompts.prompt: Give me a clear personal security overview: my last sign-in time, any risky detections since {since}, number of failed sign-ins since {since}, count of my non-compliant devices, and whether I’m registered for MFA and SSPR. Keep it compact with bullet points and include the exact timestamps.

template.name: my-security-overview
template.title: My security overview
template.description: Summarizes key personal signals (last sign-in, risk detections, failed sign-ins, non-compliant devices, MFA/SSPR registration) since a given UTC timestamp.

prompts.prompt: List my recent sign-ins since {since}. Show date/time (UTC), app, status (success/failure), Conditional Access result, IP, and location. Group obvious failures at the top.

template.name: my-recent-signins-detailed
template.title: My recent sign-ins (detailed)
template.description: Shows detailed personal sign-ins since a UTC timestamp, highlighting failures first.

arguments.name: since
arguments.description: UTC timestamp lower bound for sign-ins.

prompts.prompt: Were there any risky sign-ins or detections for me in the last {days} days? Summarize risk level, event type, when, IP/location, and what likely triggered it.

template.name: my-risk-activity
template.title: My risky sign-ins & detections
template.description: Summarizes riskDetections for the current user and flags risky sign-ins within a recent window.

arguments.name: days
arguments.description: How many days back to check (e.g., 7).

prompts.prompt: List my devices from Intune/Endpoint Manager. Highlight non-compliant ones at the top with OS, version, last sync time, and a brief reason if available.

template.name: my-devices-summary
template.title: My devices summary
template.description: Shows owned/managed devices with compliance status and last sync time, prioritizing non-compliant.

prompts.prompt: Show full details for my device {managedDeviceId}: OS/version, compliance state, last sync, model/serial, enrollment type, and Wi-Fi MAC/IMEI if present. Also list its latest compliance and configuration states.

template.name: my-device-full-details
template.title: My device full details
template.description: Retrieves deep device details plus compliance and configuration states for one managed device.

arguments.name: managedDeviceId
arguments.description: Managed device ID from my device list.

prompts.prompt: Which of my devices haven’t synced in the last {days} days? List device name, OS, last sync time, and whether it’s compliant.

template.name: my-stale-devices
template.title: My devices with stale sync
template.description: Finds devices where lastSyncDateTime is older than a computed threshold.

arguments.name: days
arguments.description: Consider a device stale if it hasn’t synced for this many days.

prompts.prompt: List my devices from Intune/Endpoint Manager. Highlight non-compliant ones at the top with OS, version, last sync time, and a brief reason if available.

template.name: my-devices-summary
template.title: My devices summary
template.description: Shows owned/managed devices with compliance status and last sync time, prioritizing non-compliant.

prompts.prompt: List apps I’ve granted access to via consent. For each app show name (if available), scopes, and when it was granted. Flag anything that looks overly broad.

template.name: my-app-consents
template.title: My OAuth app consents
template.description: Lists OAuth2 permission grants where I’m the principal and highlights risky scopes.

prompts.prompt: Show directory audit events that I initiated since {since}. Summarize what changed, when, and the targets affected.

template.name: my-audit-trail
template.title: My directory audit trail
template.description: Surfaces directoryAudits where I’m the initiator from a given UTC timestamp.

prompts.prompt: Spot unusual sign-in locations for me since {since}. Group sign-ins by country/city, call out new or rare locations, and list the related IPs.

template.name: my-location-anomalies
template.title: My sign-in location anomalies
template.description: Analyzes recent sign-ins by location to flag unusual countries/cities.

arguments.name: since
arguments.description: UTC timestamp lower bound for analysis.

prompts.prompt: Show sign-ins blocked or failed due to Conditional Access since {since}. Include which policy result was applied and for which app.

template.name: my-ca-failures
template.title: My Conditional Access failures
template.description: Filters personal sign-ins where conditionalAccessStatus indicates failure and summarizes details.

arguments.name: since
arguments.description: UTC timestamp lower bound for sign-ins.
